field_text_formatted.value:
It is important to note that these are Entity forms not "Form API" forms, but equally as important to remember that entity != node.

A benefit of decoupling is that any entity can be considered as display only, as mutable/transactional data, or as a combination of both.

Another benefit of the content entity system in Drupal is that it provides access to hundreds of modular fields, and exposes schema information for those fields when using Druxt.
